title: Low resolution
subTitle: There are low quality, pixelated or grainy images or elements in the printed product.
action:
Validate customer's complaint visually. 
Open cPDF in Acrobat and compare the reported elements at 100% zoom.

question.text: Does the artwork at 100% zoom match the printed result?

questions.title: Does the artwork at 100% zoom match the printed result?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Send a side conversation to Artwork_Complaints inbox with the artwork complaints macro.

question.text: How does it look on the printed product?

options.action:
Open the cPDF in Illustrator and check if the pixelated image is properly embedded. 
Illustrator may warn about images not linked. 
Alternatively, look for Images within a crossed frame.

question.text: Were the elements embedded in the customer's original file?

solution.title: Low resolution
solution.action:
Create new fixed cPDF and add to the internal ticket, send the ticket to the relevant CS_Urgent inbox. 
Log the complaint in presta

questions.title: Does the artwork at 100% zoom match the printed result?
Were the elements embedded in the customer's original file?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The customers submitted files contained all links correctly embedded but these links disappeared when an artwork agent processed the file. We can proceed by reprinting by reprocessing the submitted file or offering a discount/refund.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
We see that your submitted file contained all embedded links and no issues were found. It seems the problem occurred during the prepress check.
To resolve this issue, we would like to offer you a reprint of your order, reprocessing the submitted file correctly. 
If a reprint will be too late for your needs, we can offer you a refund for this order.
Thank you for your cooperation and understanding.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Artwork - Manual Checked Complaint Type: Agent mistake- Incorrectly checked

questions.title: Does the artwork at 100% zoom match the printed result?
Were the elements embedded in the customer's original file?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: We need to review these case by case. Take into account such factors as: Priority Client, Amount of orders total, Amount of prior complaints, Amount spent total and Purchase price vs. customer price.

options.text: No, purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

questions.title: Does the artwork at 100% zoom match the printed result?
Were the elements embedded in the customer's original file?
Purchase price is under 150 or New CMR

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The customers submitted files missed the embedded links causing the placeholder links to have a low resolution.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (NEW)
summaries.description:
As non-embedded elements are an uncommon fault in customer files, we do not thoroughly look for this within our workflow. Our apologies for the inconvenience caused.
To resolve this issue, we would like to offer you a discounted reprint with a revised file.
Thank you for your understanding.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (RETURNING)
summaries.description:
I am sorry, but you approved the proof despite being informed about the potential risk of poor print quality. We have informed you that the low resolution could highly affect the printing quality causing it to be blurry.
In consideration of the inconvenience caused, we can offer you a 10% discount code that can be applied to your next order. This discount serves as a gesture of goodwill to express our commitment to customer satisfaction.
Thank you for your understanding.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Customer goodwill Complaint Type: Uploaded wrong artwork

solution.title: Low resolution
solution.action:
Create new fixed cPDF and add to the internal ticket, send the ticket to the relevant CS_Urgent inbox.
Log the complaint in presta

questions.title: Does the artwork at 100% zoom match the printed result?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The customer and us embedded all files correctly, but the supplier printed them incorrectly, which is their responsibility.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
We see that your submitted file contained all embedded links and no issues were found. Additionally, no issues were detected in the print file we sent to our printer. It seems the problem occurred during the printing process.
To resolve this issue, we would like to offer you a reprint of your order using the same file.
If a reprint will be too late for your needs, we can offer you a refund for this order.
Thank you for your cooperation and understanding.

summaries.title: Ticket to traffic
summaries.description: Request traffic to contact the supplier regarding the complaint prior to reprinting as the supplier needs to be informed in order not to repeat the same issue.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Supplier Complaint Type: Printed Incorrectly

question.text: Are lines and fonts within the minimum requirements?
Thin lines / small text warning sent?

solution.title: Low resolution
solution.action:
Create new fixed cPDF and add to the internal ticket, send the ticket to the relevant CS_Urgent inbox.
Log the complaint in presta

questions.title: Does the artwork at 100% zoom match the printed result?
Are lines and fonts within the minimum requirements?
Thin lines / small text warning sent?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The uploaded file contained lines and details that were below our recommended specifications. We checked this manually but did not send a warning so the customer was not made aware. The complaint is valid

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
Unfortunately, some details did not print to the highest quality due to small details and lines in your design. We apologize for not sending you a warning about this risk, which prevented you from being aware. 
To make it right, we would like to offer you a reprint of this order. However, we will need a new file that matches the specifications mentioned on the product page.
If a reprint is too late, we can fully refund the product.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Artwork - Manual Checked Complaint Type: No warning sent

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The uploaded file contained lines and details that were below our recommended specifications. We warned against this so can not validate this complaint.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (NEW)
summaries.description: Unfortunately, some details did not print to the highest quality. We did warn you about this since your file contained thin lines and details, which are not recommended for this product. As you are a valued customer, we would like to offer you a one-time reprint of this order. However, we will need a new file that matches the specifications mentioned on the product page.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (RETURNING)
summaries.description:
Unfortunately, some details did not print to the highest quality. We did warn you about this since your file contained thin lines and details, which are not recommended for this product.
In consideration of the inconvenience caused, we can offer you a 10% discount code that can be applied to your next order. This discount serves as a gesture of goodwill to express our commitment to customer satisfaction.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Customer goodwill Complaint Type: Uploaded wrong artwork

solution.title: Low resolution
solution.action:
Create new fixed cPDF and add to the internal ticket, send the ticket to the relevant CS_Urgent inbox.
Log the complaint in presta

questions.title: Does the artwork at 100% zoom match the printed result?
Are lines and fonts within the minimum requirements?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Since it's a complaint on the supplier and the file has no issues we can reprint after contacting traffic.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
The file you provided was of good quality, but unfortunately, it was printed with a lower DPI than expected. To make up for any inconvenience caused, I'd like to offer you a reprint of your order. 
If you can't use the reprint because it will be too late, I can offer you a refund on this order.

summaries.title: Ticket to traffic
summaries.description: Request traffic to contact the supplier regarding the complaint prior to reprinting as the supplier needs to be informed in order not to repeat the same issue.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Supplier - Quality wrong Complaint Type: Printed incorrectly

options.action:
Check the log in the DTP tab and search for a green line with a 'DTP Message - Low Resolution' warning. 
Check the Automatic Check log for a Low Resolution warning 
Check 360 for transactional email.
Automatic: Open the DTP Tab in Presta & check 'AutoCheck Artwork' box. Manual: 'Open the DTP Tab in Presta, check 'Attachments' box, and see agent name under 'Uploaded by.

solution.title: Low resolution
solution.action:
New high res file required for reprint
File complaint in Presta

questions.title: Does the artwork at 100% zoom match the printed result?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Since we didn't send a low-resolution warning as we should have, the complaint is caused by us. We can offer a reprint with a new, high-resolution file or provide a discount/refund.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
We see that the file you uploaded has a low resolution. Our team should have sent you an email about this risk. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
To resolve this issue, we would like to offer you a reprint of your order. In order to proceed, we will need a new file from you that meets the necessary resolution requirements. Could you please provide us with a high-resolution file so we can ensure the best possible print quality?
If you can't use the reprint because it will be too late, we can offer you a refund on this order.
Thank you for your cooperation and understanding. We look forward to resolving this issue promptly.

summaries.title: Log in Presta
summaries.description: Complaint Department: Artwork - Manual Checked Complaint type: No Warning Sent

solution.title: Low resolution
solution.action:
New high res file required for reprint
File complaint in Presta

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: Since we failed to send a warning, we need to rectify the situation by offering either a reprint or a refund.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer
summaries.description:
We see that the file you uploaded has a low resolution. Our autocheck system should have sent you an email about this risk. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.
To resolve this issue, we would like to offer you a reprint of your order. In order to proceed, we will need a new file from you that meets the necessary resolution requirements. Could you please provide us with a high-resolution file so we can ensure the best possible print quality?
If you can't use the reprint because it will be too late, we can offer you a refund on this order.
Thank you for your cooperation and understanding.

questions.title: Does the artwork at 100% zoom match the printed result?

summaries.title: Solution
summaries.description: The customer approved the file despite our warning about the risk of poor print quality.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (NEW)
summaries.description:
We see that the file you uploaded has a low resolution. Our team should have sent you an email about this risk. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. 
As a special consideration for being a first-time customer, we understand that you may not have been fully aware of our processes. As an exception, we would like to offer you a free reprint of your order. However, we kindly request that you provide us with a new design that does not include low resolution. This gesture is intended to ensure your satisfaction and demonstrate our commitment to delivering the best possible product.
If you can't use the reprint because it will be too late, we can offer you a refund on this order.
Thank you for your cooperation and understanding.

summaries.title: What to tell the customer (RETURNING)
summaries.description:
I am sorry, but you approved the proof despite being informed about the potential risk of poor print quality. We have informed you that the low resolution could highly affect the printing quality causing it to be blurry. 
In consideration of the inconvenience caused, we can offer you a ...% discount code that can be applied to your next order. This discount serves as a gesture of goodwill to express our commitment to customer satisfaction.
Thank you for your understanding.
